name: 華人電影導論
description: This course aimed to historically introduce the development and periods of Chinese Films in China, Taiwan and Hong Kong. Through the cinematic analysis of narrative, symbols and styles to understand the sub-genres and directors of authorships, it will help students establish the comprehensive knowledge about Chinese Films, so as to understand the close connection between cinema and periods, regions and social culture changes.
goals: The course aimed to establish students’ understanding about the historical development of Chinese Films in China, Taiwan and Hong Kong, and tried to compare the regional characteristics represented in cinema.
The course will provide students a basic training of visual comprehension, in order to realize the cinematic language.
To observe and comprehend the Chinese sociocultural factors in films in terms of genres and styles, it will help students deepen their appreciations about Chinese culture.
